warezcdn.name: Os Cavaleiros do Zodíaco: Saintia Shô
warezcdn.title: Seinto Seiya: Seintia Shô

imdb.title: Seinto Seiya: Seintia Shô
imdb.plot: Set immediately after Saint Seiya, Saint Seiya - Saintia Shou follows the traditional central plot common to Kurumada's original work and its derivative works: Athena, the Greek goddess of justice and heroic endeavor, returns when...

episodes.title: Shukumei no Shimai! Shôko to Kyôko
episodes.plot: Shoko is a student at Ryuusei Private Academy Middle School. Her dear sister, Kyoko, had went to study abroad five years ago and hasn't heard from her since. One day, an unknown entity suddenly attacks Shoko. The ones who attacked her had been the Dryads, underlings of the evil goddess, Eris, who was once sealed by Goddess Athena. When Shoko and Saori Kido awaiting the Galaxian Wars meet, the gears of destiny begin to turn.

episodes.title: Sorezore no Ketsui! Megami to Seintia
episodes.plot: Shoko cannot hide the shock knowing Kyoko was taken away instead of her as the evil god's host. As Shoko finds out the special position of Athena's handmaidens as well as bodyguards that only women can fill, she decides to become a Saintia herself from her desire to become stronger in order to rescue her sister. Saori requests the Silver Saint, Pavo Mayura, for Shoko's training, however - On the other hand, Milo and Aiolia at the Sanctuary were sensing the evil Goddess Eris' suspicious moves.

episodes.title: Yami ni Saku! Erisu no Doriâdo-tachi
episodes.plot: The underlings of the evil goddess, Malice Emony and Murder Phonos, plot to take Athena's head to offer it to Eris and raids Saori. Mii stands up against Emony who continues to call Saori an "incomplete god". Shoko's Cosmo flare up during the training with Mayura. Sensing Athena's danger from the Cloth's box, can Shoko ultimately save Saori?.

episodes.title: Kanashimi no Saikai! Hedatareta Shimai no Kizuna
episodes.plot: Shoko succeeded in entering Eris' temple by chasing Phonos who fled battle. As she searches the temple to save her sister, Kyoko, she is informed of a shocking fact by Ate. When Ate's vines catch Shoko off guard and begin to attack, a golden light enwraps her body. To bring back Shoko, Mii heads to Eris' temple and reunites with her where they find Kyoko's ragged body before their eyes.

episodes.title: Tobe! Pegasasu no Yô ni
episodes.plot: Kyoko's Cosmo disappeared in the battle at Eris' temple. Saori's heart wavers as she questions her existence from not being able to save Kyoko in defeating the evil god. However, with Saori inheriting Mitsumasa Kido's will, the Galaxian Wars start without mercy. On the other hand, Shoko who was in the hospital had been depressed from Saori telling her goodbye, and she drops the pendant of Pegasus given to her by her sister. The boy who caught it for her was Pegasus Seiya who was entering the Galaxian Wars.

episodes.title: Semegiau Tamashî! Saori tai Kyôkô
episodes.plot: Aphrodite of Pisces takes Athena to the Sanctuary by order of the Grand Master, where both will meet face to face. What secret does the Grand Master hide behind his tears? Meanwhile, Mayura has detected that the remains of Eris are producing an effect that could be catastrophic.

episodes.title: Jûnikyû no Shitô! Osorubeki Jarei no Genwaku
episodes.plot: The moment the golden arrow strikes Saori, the Ghosts begin to stir. Shoko who was the evil god's shell had lost conscious, having her soul pulled by the Ghosts. Mayura and the Saintias work hard to calm the evil spirits while Seiya and the Bronze Saints hurry through the Sanctuary to save Athena. Now, the deadly battle of the twelve temples begin.

episodes.title: Akumu no Gekitotsu! Moeagaru Shishi no Ken
episodes.plot: After the deadly battle, the Saints of the Sanctuary all swear their loyalty to Saori-Athena. Meanwhile, Eris, who was thought to have been sealed, had fused with her host, Kyoko, and multiplied her powers. Saori rises against Eris to protect Shoko, but receives the curse of the apple. The Gold Saints head to the Temple of Eris along with the Saintias to save Athena and to stop the evil god from scattering the Evil Seeds of war that fill people's hearts with hate. That's where Aiolia witnesses his own brother turning his fists against him.

episodes.title: Arasoi no Uzu! Ôgon no Ringo to Orion no Kenshin
episodes.plot: Can you defeat your sister who has fused with the evil god? With Mu's question, Shoko agonizes over the fate she bears. That's when Orion Rigel, the Ghost of an ex-Silver Saint, stands before Shoko. From Rigel's sad eyes that once shared a past with Kyoko during Saint years, Shoko senses his true feelings and - Mii vs. Emony, Aiolia vs. Saga, the individual battles within the Temple of Eris begins.

episodes.title: Kagayake Shôjo-tachi yo! Kedakaki Inori no Hate ni
episodes.plot: Finally, Shoko faces the evil god Eris. As Saori's Cosmo grows weaker, all of the Saintias-Shoko, Mii, Xiaoling, Katya, and Erda-put their hearts together to challenge Eris. The Gold Saints continue to protect the Sanctuary as they find out Eris' plan of crashing the temple into it. Aiolia and Milo, who face Saga in a deadly battle, plans to destroy the temple, however - A raging destiny encircles the Saintias, Gold Saints, evil god Eris, and Saori Kido. The final battle begins.
